goal.ch:
一: 提供學生內分泌學方面的知識
二: 訓練學生具有口頭表達內分泌生理領域知識的能力與技巧
三: 訓練學生具有書面表達, 文獻閱讀與整合以及批判內分泌生理領域知識的能力與技巧
四: 藉由課堂上充分的討論啟發學生對內分泌生理領域的興趣以及專業知識的取得
goal.en:
1.Provide students with knowledge in the field of endocrinology.
2.Train students in the ability and skills to orally express knowledge of endocrine physiology.
3.Train students in the ability and skills of written expression, literature reading and integration, and critical thinking in the field of endocrine physiology.
4.Inspire students‘ interest in the field of endocrine physiology and facilitate the acquisition of professional knowledge through extensive discussions in class.

Week 1-6 I. Introduction to the endocrine
systems of vertebrates (1-4)
Week 1 Nature of chemical mediation
Week 2 What are hormones? What do they do?
Week 3 Endocrine methodologies
Week 4 Hormone biosynthesis and metabolism.

Week 6 Overview of vertebrate systems.

function 5-8, 20
Week 7 Pituitary gland, pituitary
hormones, ““master gland““
evolution 5

Neurohypophysial hormones
Week 9 Opiomelanocortins
Week 10 Pineal gland (20)
Week 11-18 III. Coordination
Week 11 Calcium homeostasis
Week 12 Gastrointestinal hormones (10)
Week 13 Pancreatic hormones and metabolic
regulation (11)
Week 14 Growth hormones (12)
Week 15 Thyroid hormones (13)
Week 16 Catecholamines, the sympathoadrenal
system and Adrenal steroid hormones
(14-15)
Week 17 Endocrinology of sex differentiation
and reproduction (16-19)
Week 18 Biomedical diseases: obesity,
diabetes, prostate cancer
